full_summary:
# Electrical and Electronic Products Procurement

## Summary of the Procurement

The Department of National Defence issues a procurement notice for various electrical supplies to be delivered under a contract with a proposed end date of September 30, 2024.

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-251-62596699
* **Solicitation Number**: W2037-250062/A
* **Publication Date**: May 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 14, 2024 at 11:00 am
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 17, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Kingston, Ontario (except NCR)

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 21 Dufferin Crescent, Oromocto, NB E2V 4J5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact**: 
	+ Name: Mathieu Sly
	+ Email: [mathieu.sly@forces.gc.ca](mailto:mathieu.sly@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (506) 422-7454

## Tender Documents

The tender notice is available on [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The notice URL has not been specified. Attached to the notice is a copy of the proposed procurement notice.

## Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for electrical components including:

* Various electrical supplies

The proposed contract is expected to end on September 30, 2024.

## Important Notes

* The tender closing date is June 14, 2024 at 11:00 am.
* The tender notice is open to Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under SA E60HN-16ELEC.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.  I was able to rework the original document to better represent what you are asking for. Let me know if you have any
